summary:
- **General Meeting Results**: All resolutions voted upon were carried (passed).  
- **Key Approved Items**:  
  - Ratification of multiple Placement Shares issuances under ASX Listing Rules 7.1 and 7.1A (over 98% approval).  
  - Approval of Broker Options issuances (Bell Potter and CPS Capital Group, ~97-98% approval).  
  - Approval of Performance Rights and Employee Securities Incentive Plan issuances to key personnel (Whittaker, Hancock, Rezos, Mcillree, Sondergaard; approval rates 90-96%).  

*No material capital markets or trading actions identified beyond approvals.*
